languages.text: {n}Техножрец задумчиво отвечает, помигивая визором:{/n} "Утверждение истинно. Эта конструкция собрана вопреки канону и, безусловно, должна быть демонтирована. Но немного позже".

{n}The Tech-Priest's tone is pensive, and his visor flashes:{/n} "This statement is true. This construct has been assembled in contravention of canon law and must certainly be disassembled. But not quite yet."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец задумчиво отвечает, помигивая визором:{/n} "Утверждение истинно. Эта конструкция собрана вопреки канону и, безусловно, должна быть демонтирована. Но немного позже".

languages.text: {n}这位技术神甫以沉思的语气开了口，他的面甲闪闪发光：{/n}“这种说法是正确的。这台造物是在违反教规的情况下被组装起来的，它自然必须被拆解掉，但现在还不是时候。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's tone is pensive, and his visor flashes:{/n} "This statement is true. This construct has been assembled in contravention of canon law and must certainly be disassembled. But not quite yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位技术祭司以沉思的语气开了口，他的面甲闪闪发光：{/n}“确实如此，这台造物是在违反教规的情况下被组装起来的。当然，它必须被拆解掉，但现在还不是时候。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote se muestra pensativo y su visor destella:{/n} «La declaración es correcta. Esta estructura ha sido ensamblada de forma contraria a los cánones y debe ser desmantelada. Pero todavía no».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's tone is pensive, and his visor flashes:{/n} "This statement is true. This construct has been assembled in contravention of canon law and must certainly be disassembled. But not quite yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote se muestra pensativo y su visor destella:{/n} «La declaración es correcta. Esta estructura ha sido ensamblada de forma contraria a los cánones y debe ser desmantelada. Pero todavía no».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技術司祭の口ぶりには悲痛さが漂っており、バイザーが光る。{/n}「この発言は正しい。この構造物は教会法に反して組み立てられたものであり、確実に解体されなければなりません。ですが、まだされていないようです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's tone is pensive, and his visor flashes:{/n} "This statement is true. This construct has been assembled in contravention of canon law and must certainly be disassembled. But not quite yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭の口ぶりには悲痛さが漂っており、バイザーが光る。{/n}「この発言は正しい。この構造物は教会法に反して組み立てられたものであり、確実に解体されなければなりません。ですが、まだされていないようです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Ton ist Techpriesters ist nachdenklich, und sein Visor blinkt.{/n} "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Das Konstrukt wurde in Verletzung kanonischen Rechts errichtet und muss demontiert werden. Aber noch nicht jetzt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's tone is pensive, and his visor flashes:{/n} "This statement is true. This construct has been assembled in contravention of canon law and must certainly be disassembled. But not quite yet."

traits.locale_text: {/n}Der Ton ist Techpriesters ist nachdenklich, und sein Visor blinkt.{n} "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Das Konstrukt wurde in Verletzung kanonischen Rechts errichtet und muss demontiert werden. Aber noch nicht jetzt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre est pensif, et sa visière clignote lorsqu'il répond :{/n} « Cette affirmation est exacte. Cette structure a été assemblée en infraction de la loi canonique et doit sans aucun doute être démantelée. Mais pas tout de suite. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's tone is pensive, and his visor flashes:{/n} "This statement is true. This construct has been assembled in contravention of canon law and must certainly be disassembled. But not quite yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprête est pensif, et sa visière clignote lorsqu'il répond :{/n} « Cette affirmation est correcte. Cette structure a été assemblée en infraction de la loi canonique et doit sans aucun doute être démantelée. Mais pas tout de suite. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in vizörü ışıldarken dalgın bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu önerme doğru. Bu yapı, nizamname kanunları ihlal edilerek monte edilmiş ve muhakkak demonte edilmeli. Ancak henüz değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's tone is pensive, and his visor flashes:{/n} "This statement is true. This construct has been assembled in contravention of canon law and must certainly be disassembled. But not quite yet."
